title: Perform Geotechnical Face Mapping
description: A geotechnical engineer maps the structural features (e.g., joints, faults) on a newly exposed pit wall or underground tunnel face.

tasks.description: Take high-resolution photos of the rock face using photogrammetry.
tasks.expected_outcome: A 3D model of the rock face is created from the photos.

tasks.description: On the 3D model, identify and trace the major structural features.
tasks.expected_outcome: All significant geological structures are digitized.

tasks.description: Analyze the orientation of the structures to assess the risk of rockfalls or wedge failures and update the ground support design if needed.
tasks.expected_outcome: The stability of the rock face is assessed, and the support plan is confirmed or updated.
